creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: 8-panel landscape screen; small snow-covered village scene; views of water with scattered rock formations; fishing boats; fishing village; village market with a river and small figures
marks: Signature and Seal LRC: Hōin Tan\'yū rokujūnisai hitsu
medium: Ink and light color on silk
title: Eight Views of the Xiao and Xiang Rivers
